snippet: The move transforms the more than 4,000 local Walmart stores into distribution centers — Amazon, by contrast, had fewer than 40 warehouses at the end of last year.
abstract: Wal-Mart Stores says it has begun testing same-day delivery for online purchases in a handful of cities across the country; move transforms the more than 4,000 local Wal-Mart stores into distribution centers and gives the company a competitive edge against online giant Amazon.
lead_paragraph: The move transforms the more than 4,000 local Walmart stores into distribution centers — Amazon, by contrast, had fewer than 40 warehouses at the end of last year.
